description: Simple 2-deliverable marketing campaign for integration testing. Validates that Lisa can create marketing content, run SEO and brand checks, and complete successfully.

deliverables.title: Product announcement social posts
deliverables.description: Create 3 social media posts announcing a new product feature. Platform: LinkedIn and Twitter. Audience: B2B technology buyers. Tone: Professional but approachable. Each post should: (1) Lead with benefit, (2) Include specific metric or proof point, (3) End with clear CTA. Posts should vary in format: one question-based, one stat-based, one customer story. Target keyword: 'enterprise automation' should appear naturally in at least one post.
acceptanceCriteria: Each post under 280 characters for Twitter compatibility
Target keyword 'enterprise automation' appears in at least one post
Clear CTAs (e.g., 'Learn more', 'Start trial', 'Read case study')
deliverables.notes: First test deliverable - should complete quickly. Tests brand, readability, and SEO quality gates.

deliverables.title: Product launch email
deliverables.description: Create a single product launch announcement email (not a full sequence, just one email for testing). Audience: Existing customers. Goal: Announce new feature and drive adoption. Email should include: Subject line (under 60 chars), Preview text, Body with benefit-led intro, 2-3 key feature highlights, Customer proof or testimonial, CTA to learn more or try feature. Tone: Friendly and excited but professional. Target keyword: 'workflow automation' should appear in subject or first paragraph.
acceptanceCriteria: Body structured: intro, features, proof, CTA
Target keyword 'workflow automation' in subject or intro
deliverables.notes: Second test deliverable. Tests all marketing quality gates: brand, readability, SEO, accessibility.
